docs.text: Saman Atapattu For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Home mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
